# UIPasteControl.DisplayMode.labelOnly

**Case**

A display mode for a textual label.

## Declaration

```swift
case labelOnly
```

## Discussion

The label’s text reads “Paste”. The value you set for [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteControl/Configuration-swift.class/baseForegroundColor] colors the text.

## Choosing a display mode

- **UIPasteControl.DisplayMode.iconAndLabel**: A display mode for a button that composes an icon and a textual label.
- **UIPasteControl.DisplayMode.iconOnly**: A display mode for an icon button.
